text: ma wetha enna;
kabba kochchara washi welada kiyanawanan dasun langatama enakan dakke naha.
ra ahase itha pahasuwen hadunagatha haki, oonama ayekuta bohoma supurudu aakasha wasthuwa wana sada thawath ek aakasha wasthuwak lesa hadin wima sudusuda?
ehi mema tablattuwa kinam hadayak ganidayi dala rupa magin mudranaya wi thibima me puwatha thawath poshanaya karannak.
mema puwatha pala wimen atham balawega mathiwaranayedi wasi gannata ida thibena nisa mema prakashayata da kalin puwathata dun pramukhathawa ma laba dena lesa illa sitinawa.

kalakaruwan menma ithihasagnyayan purawidyagnyayan sahithyadharayan agana deshapalana nayakayan rasak da dakunulakin sirilaka eekaloka kalo ya.ebandu urumayakata nakam kiyana maha theranamak lesa galla kaluwalle jathyanthara bauddha madhyasthanadhipathi ruhunu wishwawidyalaye ha shri lanka bauddha ha pali wishwawidyalaye hitapu kathikacharya shasthrapathi shasthra wisharada darshanapathi kanumuldeniye chandawimala himipanan gaurawayata ha jana prasadayata pathrawa sitithi.prasanna awathum pawathum walin da daya - karuna gunangayangen da samaja sewaya behewin pi්raya karanu labana mahatheranamak washayen da chandawimala maha nahimiyo prasiddhaya.
hariyatama ape mese pahukaragena yanna gihin eya nawathuna.

"man umbaata kiwwa hamadeyak ganama umbaata dan kalintath wadiya therenawa athine pubudu..
obage pera bhawayanda eeta ayathya.
ewannakadi palamuwa, · pirisidu wima.
chutamma : mage langa thiyenawa diga batayak, eeken baluwama penawa.
ese pawathwima podu sanskruthiyak nirmanaya kara ganimata da rukulak weyi.
ehema komis gannawada deshapremi minissu.
me pansala, me nalikawa bara shasthrapathi daranagama kusaladhamma swaminwahanse asanipa thaththwayen me dinawala pasuwenawa kiyala aaranchi wuna.
lagakadi aaye gena ekak nadda??"

dawasak hawasaka kochchara padam kalath mathaka hitinnathi podi ewunge mara suththare ee kiyanne "chakkare "padam kara kara inna welawaka pare mallila ,ayiyala gahanawa krikat..onna ithin bawunsar panduwakata midon pradeshayata ella karapu paharak hethuwen panduwa watuna palleha waththata .pena widihata eya dawi yamak .pare krikat hari intrastin,polis wahanayak dakkoth okkoma thappen panala path wenawa nikam es ti ef wage ,eha gedara janelleta bole wadunoth ahagannawa ambanaka sinhalen nam bariya ful inglish moko ankal kristhiyan :)mewan kura :)samajaya madde ape ayage krikat nam intarnashanal eewa wage neme.ruls ematayi .paren palleha udin giyoth awut,bimin giyoth ottu na,wahale ,janel wala wadunoth awut,bole nathi wunoth okkoma hoyannath oone .last manta chansuth na.

- shri lankawa thula bottu nishpadana karmanthaya wadidiyunu kirime aramunin ee sandaha niyamana wyuhayak sakasimata awashya pahasukam sapayima saha danata sitina bottu nishpadakayin sandaha siya karmantha pawathwa ganimata awashya wana yatithala pahasukam salasime aramunin waligama, kapparathota bottu diyath kirime sthanaya, lissum manga ha aluthwadiya pahasukam idi kirima ha diyakadanaya idi kirima pinisa shakyatha adhyayanaya sidu kirimata niyamithaya.
